message.body: Hey!! If you are around tmw afternoon or night, come over for pie! I'm supposed to leave for LA Friday but I have a feeling my flight will be cancelled.
Woah! I would love some of that pie!!
I've had a cold the past couple days, but if I'm feeling better tomorrow I'll definitely come by!
God. I kinda hope I don't have to go. Meeting Emily's baby Sofie just for the weekend. Feel better!! Lay low. I'll bring you a slice if you need me too!!
Oh man, she's cute! When are you supposed to fly out?
Friday morning? It will have stopped by then just don't know if there will be huge delays
Yeah there might be! This weather has been loco! I will KIT about tomorrow...I need that pie!
There's a parking ban on chestnut tonight! You probably know already but just in case!
I was wondering because there are barely any cars parked on the street! Thanks for the heads up! :)
